akn:section.akn:heading: Legal effect of certificate of sale of personal property and deed of real property.

akn:content.akn:p: In all cases of sale of property (other than real property) sold under ยง 47-4472, the certificate of the sale:
In the case of the sale of real property under ยง 47-4472:

A certificate of sale of personal property given, or a deed to real property executed, under ยง 47-4475 shall discharge the property from all liens, encumbrances, and titles over which the lien of the District of Columbia with respect to which the levy was made had priority.
